amendment.description: To require the Director of the NIH shall conduct a comprehensive study and submit to Congress a report that includes a portfolio analysis of current funding levels of the NIH related to mental health and substance use disorder.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3858 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
